title.h1: Welcome on the Awl web site

section.name: introduction
section.p:
Interaction between software and user sometimes requires more comfort, clarity, simplicity, forcing to proceed step by step. In these cases, wizards are the best solutions.
Nowaday, the standard Java API does not provide mecanism to create wizards.
the aim of Awl, Another Wizard Library, is to provide a framework which allow to easily create wizards in any Java applications that used a graphical user interface based on Java Swing.
This site propose a short tutorial and documentation on how to use Awl.
Awl, under license LPGL 2.1, is available for differents versions of Java runtime environments, 1.5 and 1.4.
For any purposes, send a mail to : xixi31@users.sourceforge.net
